original_text: And the report was good in the eyes of the people of Israel. And the people of Israel blessed God and spoke no more of making war against them to destroy the land where the people of Reuben and the people of Gad were settled.
korean_text: 그 일이 이스라엘 자손을 즐겁게 한지라 이스라엘 자손이 하나님을 찬송하고 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손이 거주하는 땅에 가서 싸워 그것을 멸하자 하는 말을 다시는 하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: in the eyes of the people of Israel
And the people of Israel blessed God
and spoke no more of making war against them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 치기 위한 전쟁에 대해 더 이상 말하지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: where the people of Reuben and the people of Gad were settled
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤 백성과 갓 백성이 정착한 곳
